# Documentation

## Installation

```shell
git clone https://github.com/Pandaxyz-xd/Coloripy.git
cd Coloripy
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

## Usage

### superprogram.py

```python
import coloripy
mylogo = "Super program"
coloripy.color_letter(mylogo)
```

```shell
python3 superprogram.py
```
